flavor-text: You can't gain something without giving something in return.

flavor-text: Master of the gun, the blade, and philosophy.

flavor-text: I got a pretty good look at you.

flavor-text: Three sims are better than one.

flavor-text: Man hands on misery to man.

flavor-text: It will not last the night.

flavor-text: I'll get home early from work.

name: Clairvoyance
flavor-text: A broken smile beneath her whispered wings.

flavor-text: She's the only one who knows what it is to burn.

flavor-text: VIII. Never turn your back on a Monster!

name: Flipper
flavor-text: Put one foot in front of the other.

flavor-text: Watch me crank it, watch me roll.

flavor-text: Don't go to pieces on me.

flavor-text: Um allan heim, styttur hrynja fyrir mig.

flavor-text: By one, by two, by three!

flavor-text: It's closer than you think! (no it isn't)

flavor-text: I prefer the weapon you only need to fire once.

flavor-text: He'd want you to have it.
